snippet: The leader of the coup said the meeting would determine “what will be best for the country in a consensual, democratic fashion.”
abstract: Capt Amadou Haya Sanogo, the leader of the coup that ousted the president of Mali, calls for a national convention of politicians and civilians to determine the country's future.

byline.contributor: Alan Cowell contributed reporting from London and J. David Goodman from New York.

lead_paragraph: The leader of the coup said the meeting would determine “what will be best for the country in a consensual, democratic fashion.”

headline.seo: Mali Junta Calls for National Meeting

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
